header_slogan: Solutions don`t fall from the sky
about_text01: Hi, welcome to my personal page 😎, before anything else please hit me up with feedback on this page because it helps me grow and improve, I also need some testers for free👨‍💻.
about_text02: Let me give you a brief introduction about me, you already know my name(it’s below my hugly face🧔 up there in the header), I come from a beautiful country in the iberian peninsula next to Spain(try to guess 🇵🇹 🙄), I’m a person that gets things done💪. All you need to know 😂…
about_text03: Just kidding, well i can tell you more directly 🙋‍♂️, if you pay close attention👀 you can see bits of my personality in this text and throughout my site, also the point is to keep it interesting enough and invite you for a coffee ☕ to find out the rest of the mystery👾 and maybe we can have a symbiotic agreement in which we can provide each other value🤝..
about_text04: What else i can is that I became a developer through the being self taught🧐, but i studied administration, development is for me what rockets🚀 are for Elon Musk, a pain in the a#& to build and improve but I love🥰 every step, in my case it is not that expensive💰 and doesn’t get me to space🧑‍🚀.
about_text05: Well let’s leave it at that, follow me on my social media and keep tuned to see what else i create ☢️ ☣️.
sardinha_text: They provide driving services within Switzerland.
left_text: A group o people entusiastic about cars, if you like road engines, check them out!
hobbies_text03: The nature holds answers to questions man has not yet learned to ask. 🗻🌊
